alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:18PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Dale and Henry Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 918 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Beans Crossroads to near Richards Crossroads to 8 miles north of Fort Gaines. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Ariton, Shorterville, Bells Crossroads, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Edwin, Hayes, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Snells Crossroads, Graball, Thomas Mill Creek, Phillips Crossroads, Skipperville, Barnes, Hardwickburg, Capps, Otho, Roberts Crossroads and Barefield Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
